doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Mojibar Rahman Selim
doctor.degree: MBBS, DTCD, MD (Cardiology), WHO Fellow (Interventional Cardiology)
doctor.workplace: TMSS Medical College & Rafatullah Community HospitalProject Director, TMSS Heart Center, BoguraEx-Professor & Head, Department of CardiologyShaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital, Bogura
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Mojibar Rahman Selim is a highly experienced Clinical and Interventional Cardiologist and Chest Specialist in Bogura. He holds MBBS, DTCD, MD (Cardiology) degrees and is a WHO Fellow in Interventional Cardiology. Currently, he is Professor and Head of the Department of Cardiology at TMSS Medical College & Rafatullah Community Hospital and Project Director of TMSS Heart Center, Bogura. He previously served as Professor and Head of the Department of Cardiology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital, Bogura. Dr. Selim treats heart diseases, hypertension, chest diseases, and performs interventional cardiology procedures. His chamber is at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogura, House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura, with visiting hours from 2:30pm to 8:30pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Debashis Kumar Gupta
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Debashis Kumar Gupta is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MCPS, MD (Chest Diseases). He is a Former Assistant Professor & Head, Respiratory Medicine at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Debashis Kumar Gupta at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 1pm to 4pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Rabindra Chandra Mitra
doctor.info: Dr. Rabindra Chandra Mitra is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), DTCD (DU). He is a Consultant, Chest Diseases at Chest Disease Hospital, Bogra. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Maleka Nursing Home, Bogura. Practicing hour of Dr. Rabindra Chandra Mitra at Maleka Nursing Home, Bogura is 10am to 3pm (Everyday).
